channel.title: Quick Start on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Quick Start on Zeebe Node.js Client Guide

item.title: Zeebe Node Quickstart
item.description: Prerequisites Node.js / npm A Zeebe broker running locally (refer to the broker documentation). Import the Zeebe Node library Create an index.js file (or index.ts for TypeScript). In there, import the Zeebe Node library: import { ZBClient } from 'zeebe-node' const { ZBClient } = require('zeebe-node') Create a ZBClient import { ZBClient } from 'zeebe-node' const zbc = new ZBClient() const { ZBClient } = require('zeebe-node') const zbc = new ZBClient() This establishes a connection to a Zeebe broker running on localhost:26500.
